title: Reliance to commission new energy giga complex this year
description: Reliance Industries Ltd is set to commission the Dhirubhai Ambani Green Energy Giga Complex, one of the largest integrated renewable energy manufacturing facilities, in Gujarat. The complex includes five giga factories for photovoltaic panels, fuel cell system, green hydrogen, energy storage, and power electronics. Reliance has signed an MoU with the Gujarat government to set up 100 gigawatt renewable power.
